column4: can someone help me with my wireless card - after using ndiswrapper it functioned properly but after restart it has stopped working completly
sudo nano /etc/modules , add the word ndiswrapper there on it's own line so it will be loaded on reboot
sudo modprobe ndiswrapper should bring your wireless up now
thanks i will try that. I gotta load between XP and ubuntu so ill be a while
